page.title: 19Petworth Playground Games
page.content: Marbles: here are two games - SMACKS - you need two or more players . The first person rolls their marble and the other person has got to try and smack it. If he smacks the first person's marble he has won. HOLES - once again you need two people to pkay. The first person tries to get her marble in the hole the other person would probably put his marble far away from the hole. The person whose marble is nearest to the hole can take another go if he gets it in the hole he has won. Other games which we play - hopscotch, climbing frame, stoolball, foorball, rounders, cricket and catch.
